mapper.select: SELECT PRT_IDN, SRCH_YMD, PRP_NO, CFP_NM, CONFM_YMD, SRCHP_NM, MGT_GBN, MGT_YN, UNUSED_STT, SRV_REGN, SRV_ZONE, CT_PLN_FC, LNTRD_PRM, ENV, CNVE_FCL, PB_LCMTN, RD_SRFC, MRD_DIST, HIGH_LW, SHAPE, DIRECTION, USE_LIMIT, USE_SITU_JIMK, USE_SITU, USE_MEANS_NM, USE_NEAR_FILJI_NUM, USE_TOT_AR, USE_REP_FILJI, USE_MUSE_MBD, USE_BDNG_STC, USE_STC_ROF, USE_SRV, USE_BDNG_LAYER, USE_YAREA, USE_CNST_D, USE_THIRDP_BDNG, USE_BDNG_OWNER_NM, USE_ABDNG_REGST_YN, ETC_SRV_REGN, ETC_CNT, ETC_AM, ETC_SHA_QUOTA, ETC_USE_FORM, ETC_USE_CAN_SRV, ETC_USE_CAN_AR, ETC_LOC, ETC_NEAR_SITU, ETC_ITEM, ETC_RM, MAN_CDE, MAN_NM, MND_NM, PBP_KND, BJD_CDE, LOC_PLC, MONUT, BUN, HO, PTY_PC, ACC_NM, MESRV_NM, ACQ_DEPT, ACQ_DATE, ACQ_CDE, ACQ_PC, RST_YN, PST_NUM, LOAN_YN FROM V_BML_ACEX_AS WHERE PRT_IDN = #{prtIdn}

SELECT PRT_IDN, SRCH_YMD, PRP_NO, CFP_NM, CONFM_YMD, SRCHP_NM, MGT_GBN, MGT_YN, UNUSED_STT, SRV_REGN, SRV_ZONE, CT_PLN_FC, LNTRD_PRM, ENV, CNVE_FCL, PB_LCMTN, RD_SRFC, MRD_DIST, HIGH_LW, SHAPE, DIRECTION, USE_LIMIT, USE_SITU_JIMK, USE_SITU, USE_MEANS_NM, USE_NEAR_FILJI_NUM, USE_TOT_AR, USE_REP_FILJI, USE_MUSE_MBD, USE_BDNG_STC, USE_STC_ROF, USE_SRV, USE_BDNG_LAYER, USE_YAREA, USE_CNST_D, USE_THIRDP_BDNG, USE_BDNG_OWNER_NM, USE_ABDNG_REGST_YN, ETC_SRV_REGN, ETC_CNT, ETC_AM, ETC_SHA_QUOTA, ETC_USE_FORM, ETC_USE_CAN_SRV, ETC_USE_CAN_AR, ETC_LOC, ETC_NEAR_SITU, ETC_ITEM, ETC_RM, MAN_CDE, MAN_NM, MND_NM, PBP_KND, BJD_CDE, LOC_PLC, MONUT, BUN, HO, PTY_PC, ACC_NM, MESRV_NM, ACQ_DEPT, ACQ_DATE, ACQ_CDE, ACQ_PC, RST_YN, PST_NUM, LOAN_YN FROM V_BML_ACEX_AS WHERE BJD_CDE = #{bjdCde} AND MONUT = #{monut} AND BUN = #{bun} AND HO = #{ho}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BML_ACEX_DT( PRT_IDN, SRCH_YMD, PRP_NO, CFP_NM, CONFM_YMD, SRCHP_NM, MGT_GBN, MGT_YN, UNUSED_STT, SRV_REGN, SRV_ZONE, CT_PLN_FC, LNTRD_PRM, ENV, CNVE_FCL, PB_LCMTN, RD_SRFC, MRD_DIST, HIGH_LW, SHAPE, DIRECTION, USE_LIMIT, USE_SITU_JIMK, USE_SITU, USE_MEANS_NM, USE_NEAR_FILJI_NUM, USE_TOT_AR, USE_REP_FILJI, USE_MUSE_MBD, USE_BDNG_STC, USE_STC_ROF, USE_SRV, USE_BDNG_LAYER, USE_YAREA, USE_CNST_D, USE_THIRDP_BDNG, USE_BDNG_OWNER_NM, USE_ABDNG_REGST_YN, ETC_SRV_REGN, ETC_CNT, ETC_AM, ETC_SHA_QUOTA, ETC_USE_FORM, ETC_USE_CAN_SRV, ETC_USE_CAN_AR, ETC_LOC, ETC_NEAR_SITU, ETC_ITEM, ETC_RM ) VALUES( #{prtIdn, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{srchYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prpNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfpNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confmYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srchpNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgtGbn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgtYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unusedStt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvRegn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvZone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctPlnFc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lntrdPrm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{env, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnveFcl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pbLcmtn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdSrfc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrdDist, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highLw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shape, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useLimit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useSituJimk, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useSitu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useMeansNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useNearFiljiNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useTotAr, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{useRepFilji, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useMuseMbd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useBdngStc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useStcRof, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useSrv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useBdngLayer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useYarea, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{useCnstD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useThirdpBdng, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useBdngOwnerNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useAbdngRegstYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcSrvRegn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcCnt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcAm, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{etcShaQuota, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcUseForm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcUseCanSrv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcUseCanAr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcLoc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcNearSitu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcRm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
